glosses: selfie taken spontaneously; showing how one looks with no makeup, preparation, etc.

examples.text: Bana da uzaktan flört ettiğim birisi "anlık atsanağğğ, boydan olsun ama, fiziğin nasıl" gibi taleplerde ısrarla bulunsa küfür etmesem de numarasını engellerim.
examples.translation: Me too, if sb I'm flirting with long-distance, persistently made requests like "seNd A sELfIe, but lemme see your entire body, how's your physique", I would block his number even if I wouldn't curse.

glosses: selfie taken spontaneously; showing how one looks with no makeup, preparation, etc.
